You are given a string of lowercase English letters. You will then be given a series of queries. Each query consists of three numbers: $i$, $j$, and $k$.  

* If $k = 1$, you need to sort the substring of the string from index $i$ to $j$ (inclusive) in non-decreasing order.
* If $k = 0$, you need to sort the substring from index $i$ to $j$ (inclusive) in non-increasing order.

After applying all the queries, output the final modified string.

You are given a string and a list of instructions. Each instruction tells you to sort a part of the string in either ascending or descending order.  Output the final string after applying all the instructions.
